decks.notes: This deck aims to quickly assemble the combo of Nomads en-Kor, Springheart Nantuko, and Nadu, Winged Wisdom to generate infinite card draw and mana, leading to a win through either decking the opponent with Thassa's Oracle or generating enough mana to overwhelm them. It utilizes efficient mana creatures like Noble Hierarch and Birds of Paradise, as well as powerful green spells like Green Sun's Zenith and Chord of Calling, to set up the combo quickly and protect it with cards like Allosaurus Shepherd and Sylvan Safekeeper.

The deck revolves around assembling the Painter's Servant and Grindstone combo to mill out your opponent's deck. It utilizes fast mana like Simian Spirit Guide and Ancient Tomb to power out its combo pieces quickly. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Chalice of the Void and Karn, the Great Creator to protect the combo. With a mix of control elements like Ensnaring Bridge and powerful removal in Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up its own win condition.

The deck is focused on controlling the game by utilizing counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to maintain board control and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The inclusion of cards like Counterbalance and Scroll Rack allows for additional ways to control the opponents' spells, while cards like Entreat the Angels and Terminus provide win conditions. The mana base is carefully crafted to support the control elements of the deck, with a mix of dual lands and fetch lands to ensure consistent access to the required colors. Overall, the deck aims to outlast opponents and win through attrition.
